meanings.definition: Resembling a grape in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The small, round fruit was grapelike in shape and color.
meanings.sent2: The purple flowers had a grapelike appearance, hanging in clusters.
meanings.sent3: The tiny, grapelike bubbles in the soda made it fun to drink.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and grapelike as the sound of popping bubbles.
meanings.sent5: The grapelike texture of the fabric felt smooth and cool against her skin.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a grape.
meanings.sent1: The sweet, grapelike flavor of the juice was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The vineyard had a grapelike scent that filled the air with a fruity aroma.
meanings.sent3: His grapelike personality made him a joy to be around, always cheerful and vibrant.
meanings.sent4: The music had a grapelike quality, light and melodious like a summer breeze.
meanings.sent5: The grapelike color of the sunset painted the sky in shades of purple and pink.
